body.name: LIKIMIO Full Size Bed Frame with Tall Bookcase Headboard and Charging Station, Solid and Stable Platform Bed, Noise Free, No Box Spring Needed, Vintage Brown

features: Tall Bookcase Headboard with Charging Station: headboard feature 5 open storage cubies in varying sizes, and built in charging station with 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports.

Durable and Sturdy: with central support bar, headboard double support leg, and 13 heavy-duty metal slats reinforce the sturdiness and durability of the platform full bed. No shaking supporting you in comfort and stability firmly.

Noise Free and No Slip: Quiet material is added between the slats to effective prevent noise and slip, and with footpads to protect floor. keeps you away from annoying squeaks and has a quality sleep.
Under Bed Storage: 10.4" under-bed clearance provides extra storage space to store a variety of large -sized items. Full bed frame Overall Dimension: 81.7"L x 55.5"W x 45.3"H. No Box Spring Required.
Easy to Assemble and Packed in 1 box: The storage bed frame comes in 1 box, with complete accessories and easy to read detaied instruction, just take an hour to compelet assemble.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Functional and Inviting Anchor your bedroom with a space-saving innovation with LIKIMIO Bed Frame The durable, strong, and stable Queen Bed Frame Constructed in MDF board metal frame structure and metal slats, no squeaking noise and buffering, no box spring needed;Feature a high bookcase headboard with charging station. The bookcase headboard makes it a breeze to charge and showcase your books and other important items and have them at your fingertips when you want.Its clean and elegant design will match any furniture or décor in your room and will live through any future renovations.

Previous page 5 cuby & charging station An all-in-one Bookcase Headboard with Power Out Creates a solid foundation for you to rest easy and store all your bedside essentials in style under-bed storage 10.4" under-bed clearance provides extra storage space. Makes the bedroom neater and more organised. have a good sleep No noise and Non-Slip Quiet material is added between the slats to prevent noise and slip. no squeak Durable and Stable A central support bar reinforce the sturdiness and durability of the platform bed, Easy Assembly simple to assemble with detailed instruction. Next page 1 Bookcase Headboard 2 More storage 3 No noise and Non-Slip 4 Strong Construction 5 Easy Assembly

Tall headboard A bed with 45.3 inches high headboard is great for filling up the empty wall space. Industrial Style With a mild industrial look to it without being overly trendy. it will add rustic style to any bedroom.

Bed Frame Specification Material: Heavy Metal legs, Metal Slat Support and P2 MDF Board Color vintage brown Queen size: 86.4"L x 61.8"W x 45.3"H Sturdy Construction: 13 Heavy-duty Metal Slats+ 11 Strong Support Metal Legs+ 1 central support bar Weight Capacity 1300lbs with charging staion yes Noise-Free Design yes Box Spring Required No Assembly Required yes Package Content Bed frame, Storage boocase Headboard, footboard Accessories kits Instruction All in 1 box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% Happy With This Purchase!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this bed for my son. Was easy to put up (with multiple people) and the directions were easy to follow! Both my brother-in-law and father-in-law commented on the sturdiness of this bed, claiming "it is the most sturdy bed they've ever seen".Looks exactly as pictured! Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good solid bed
reviews.reviewText: Very attractive bed. Easy to assemble. Only complaint: need some sort of cover to hide the bolts in the headboard. They're silver and they stick out like a sore thumb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Built well, impressed!!!
reviews.reviewText: Needed a bed for the spare room. Guest bed doesn't need to be 2 grand so I bought this and a hybrid box mattress. Lots of pieces, and 2 hours later, ta-da! Its built extremely well, the instructions are easy to follow, and the frame is simply amazing. One issue, although there are 12 or 14 metal slats that are pretty supportive, I would suggest a baseboard of some kind for the mattress to be better supported. Would of been a five from me if it came with that. I do recommend this bed frame. Have fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this bed so much. It looks expensive and fancy.It’s very sturdy and well made. We love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was a bit time consuming to assemble. But, a nice sturdy bed .. I would buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bed for the money
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice bed for the money. It was easy to put together, but it did take about 2 hours 2 complete.The only thing that made it difficult is the packaging that the screws were in by size came apart so I had to figure out what's screws went where. But it wasn't too hard. I also like that it has a built-in charging station and there's plenty of room underneath for storage and it does not require the box spring all you need is the mattress. They shelves on the back of the bed are shallow so they're only good for putting small things or a glass of water... it's not deep enough to put books or anything larger. My son loves his new bed and I love that he loves it. Its a win for us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a win!
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised by this purchase. Bought to give my older child's room a more grown up feel without going into debt. So glad I bought this! Very easy to put together and so far extremely sturdy. Some of the pieces even have thin foam on them to eliminate metal on metal noise. I'll more than likely purchase again for the other kiddo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks cool, but…
reviews.reviewText: The assembly of this product was INSANE. It took me several hours and my fingers were absolutely raw and stained black from the assembly tools. You really had to put some elbow grease into it, because NONE of the holes lined up at all. The directions were downright nonsensical at points, and there are misprints that make you use the wrong size screw in one step, making you run out when you need that exact size in the following step. The overall result is nice. It’s a sturdy bed that looks really cool.BUT: I do not trust the electric wiring of this thing at all. I tried plugging my phone charger into it and immediately heard a concerning buzzing. I can’t lay my head down at night and hear that. Also the gap between the headboard and where the mattress sits is so wide that a person can easily slip through it. My giant pillows slip through almost daily.Otherwise, I’m pleased with the purchase. But in no way should you expect high quality or easy assembly. It’s yet another cheap hunk of particle board and poorly painted metal. But it does look cool.
